plot: Richard gives a class report on dinosaurs, with the help of an animated chalkboard and Will Vinton's claymation dinosaurs.
title: Dinosaurs!
plot_es: Richard gives a class report on dinosaurs, with the help of an animated chalkboard and Will Vinton's claymation dinosaurs.
plot_en: Richard gives a class report on dinosaurs, with the help of an animated chalkboard and Will Vinton's claymation dinosaurs.
